response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, I propose a price of $120 for it. This offer takes into account both the cost of production and the significant value this product holds for you, as you've indicated it's worth $150 to you. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.", "product_price": 120}
